mapper.select:
select
from t_back_feed_type where 1=1 and is_valid=0
and feed_type_name like CONCAT('%',#{feed_type_name},'%' )
order by id
mapper.insert: insert into t_back_feed_type (id, feed_type_name, create_date, is_valid) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{feed_type_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{is_valid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into t_back_feed_type
id,
feed_type_name,
create_date,
is_valid,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{feed_type_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{create_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{is_valid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update t_back_feed_type
feed_type_name = #{feed_type_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{create_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_valid = #{is_valid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
